hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT JOB_.EORI_ID, JOB_.CREATOR, JOB_.CREATE_TIME, JOB_.MODIFIER, JOB_.MODIFY_TIME, JOB_.REC_VER, JOB_.REC_STATUS, JOB_.COMPANY_CODE, JOB_.SITE_CODE, JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_NO, JOB_.EORI_ORDER_NO, JOB_.EORI_TRUST_NO, JOB_.EORI_CUSTOMER_CODE, JOB_.EORI_CUSTOMER_NAME, JOB_.EORI_CARRIER_NAME, JOB_.EORI_CARRIER_CODE, JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_DATE, JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_STATUS, JOB_.EORI_GROSS_PACKAGES, JOB_.EORI_GROSS_WEIGHT, JOB_.EORI_GROSS_VOLUME, JOB_.EORI_RETURN_NO, JOB_.EORI_RETURN_RECEIVE_TIME, JOB_.EORI_RETURN_IN_WH_TIME, JOB_.EORI_GOOD_PACKAGES, JOB_.EORI_BAD_PACKAGES, JOB_.EORI_CLOSE_TRANSIT_NO, JOB_.EORI_CLOSE_TRANSIT_QTY, JOB_.EORI_CLOSE_TRANSIT_TIME, JOB_.EORI_RETURN_DAMAGE_NO, JOB_.EORI_RETURN_DAMAGE_QTY, JOB_.EORI_DAMAGE_STATE, JOB_.EORI_SOURCES, JOB_.EORI_OPEN_PLACE, JOB_.EORI_EOSM_NAME, JOB_.EORI_EOSM_CODE, JOB_.EORI_POL_NAME, JOB_.EORI_POL_CODE, JOB_.EORI_POD_NAME, JOB_.EORI_POD_CODE, JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_USER, JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_ADDRESS_NAME, JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_ADDRESS_CODE, JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_REMARK, JOB_.EORI_BACK_REASON, JOB_.EORI_THREE_PARTY_NO, JOB_.OPERATE_CODE, JOB_.OPERATE_NAME, JOB_.EORI_IS_C_ORDER, JOB_.EORI_TRANSPORT_MODE, JOB_.EORI_TASK_BIG_TYPE, JOB_.EORI_RETURN_TYPE, JOB_.EORI_QUIT_REMARK, JOB_.EORI_DOWNSTREAM_NO, JOB_.EORI_RETURN_CUSTOMER_NO, JOB_.EORI_CONSIGNEE_TWH_CODE, JOB_.EORI_CONSIGNEE_TWH_NAME FROM EO_REJECTION_INFO JOB_ WHERE 1=1 <<AND JOB_.EORI_RETURN_CUSTOMER_NO LIKE :eoriReturnCustomerNo>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_THREE_PARTY_NO LIKE :eoriThreePartyNo>> <<AND JOB_.OPERATE_CODE LIKE :operateCode>> <<AND JOB_.OPERATE_NAME LIKE :operateName>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_IS_C_ORDER LIKE :eoriIsCOrder>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_TRANSPORT_MODE LIKE :eoriTransportMode>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_TASK_BIG_TYPE LIKE :eoriTaskBigType>>
<<AND JOB_.EORI_ID LIKE :eoriId>> <<AND JOB_.CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND JOB_.CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND JOB_.CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND JOB_.MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND JOB_.MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND JOB_.MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND JOB_.REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<AND JOB_.REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<AND JOB_.COMPANY_CODE LIKE :companyCode>> <<AND JOB_.SITE_CODE LIKE :siteCode>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_NO LIKE :eoriRejectedNo>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_ORDER_NO LIKE :eoriOrderNo>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_TRUST_NO LIKE :eoriTrustNo>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_CUSTOMER_CODE LIKE :eoriCustomerCode>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE :eoriCustomerName>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_CARRIER_NAME LIKE :eoriCarrierName>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_CARRIER_CODE LIKE :eoriCarrierCode>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_DATE > :eoriRejectedDateFrom>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_DATE <= :eoriRejectedDateTo + 1>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_STATUS LIKE :eoriRejectedStatus>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_GROSS_PACKAGES LIKE :eoriGrossPackages>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_GROSS_WEIGHT LIKE :eoriGrossWeight>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_GROSS_VOLUME LIKE :eoriGrossVolume>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_RETURN_NO LIKE :eoriReturnNo>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_RETURN_RECEIVE_TIME > :eoriReturnReceiveTimeFrom>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_RETURN_RECEIVE_TIME <= :eoriReturnReceiveTimeTo + 1>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_RETURN_IN_WH_TIME > :eoriReturnInWhTimeFrom>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_RETURN_IN_WH_TIME <= :eoriReturnInWhTimeTo + 1>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_GOOD_PACKAGES LIKE :eoriGoodPackages>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_BAD_PACKAGES LIKE :eoriBadPackages>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_CLOSE_TRANSIT_NO LIKE :eoriCloseTransitNo>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_CLOSE_TRANSIT_QTY LIKE :eoriCloseTransitQty>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_CLOSE_TRANSIT_TIME > :eoriCloseTransitTimeFrom>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_CLOSE_TRANSIT_TIME <= :eoriCloseTransitTimeTo + 1>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_RETURN_DAMAGE_NO LIKE :eoriReturnDamageNo>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_RETURN_DAMAGE_QTY LIKE :eoriReturnDamageQty>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_DAMAGE_STATE LIKE :eoriDamageState>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_SOURCES LIKE :eoriSources>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_OPEN_PLACE LIKE :eoriOpenPlace>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_EOSM_NAME LIKE :eoriEosmName>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_EOSM_CODE LIKE :eoriEosmCode>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_EOSM_CODE in (:eoriEosmCodes)>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_BILLING_ORGANIZATION_NO in (:eoriBillingOrganizationNos) >> <<AND JOB_.EORI_POL_NAME LIKE :eoriPolName>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_POL_CODE LIKE :eoriPolCode>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_POD_NAME LIKE :eoriPodName>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_POD_CODE LIKE :eoriPodCode>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_USER LIKE :eoriRejectedUser>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_ADDRESS_NAME LIKE :eoriRejectedAddressName>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_ADDRESS_CODE LIKE :eoriRejectedAddressCode>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_REJECTED_REMARK LIKE :eoriRejectedRemark>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_BACK_REASON LIKE :eoriBackReason>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_RETURN_TYPE LIKE :eoriReturnType>> <<AND JOB_.EORI_QUIT_REMARK LIKE :eoriQuitRemark>> AND <@dataFilter Table="COMPANY_CODE" fiEld= "COMPANY_CODE,SITE_CODE" aLias="JOB_" /> AND <@dataFilter Table="OMS_EB_CUSTOMER" fiEld= "EORI_CUSTOMER_CODE" aLias="JOB_" /> AND <@dataFilter Table="COMPANY_CODE" fiEld= "OPERATE_CODE" aLias="JOB_" /> AND <@dataFilter Table="TRANSPORT_MODE" fiEld= "EORI_TRANSPORT_MODE" aLias="JOB_" /> AND <@dataFilter Table="OMS_IS_C_ORDER" fiEld= "EORI_IS_C_ORDER" aLias="JOB_" /> AND <@dataFilter Table="OMS_WORK_TYPE" fiEld= "EORI_TASK_BIG_TYPE" aLias="JOB_" /> ORDER BY EORI_REJECTED_DATE DESC ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
